ValidationRule.description: You cannot move Opportunity Stage directly to any of 'Proposal Submitted', 'Contract Signed' or 'Live'.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal Submitted"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Contract Signed"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Live") ), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Opportunity Recorded"), TEXT(Approval_Status__c) <> "Approved", NOT($User.Email = "tim.moyce@planetpayment.com") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot move Opportunity Stage directly to any of 'Proposal Submitted', 'Contract Signed' or 'Live'.
